sentences.sentence: Are we ready to face his grinning hideousness yet?
sentences.translation: 我们准备好面对他的咧牙了么？

sentences.sentence: So that every shriek of every child at seeing your hideousness will be yours to cherish.
sentences.translation: 这样你就不会错过每个孩子在见到你时发出的尖叫声。

sentences.sentence: As we are normal persons, even we can see the hideousness of humanity that results in their fate of withering.
sentences.translation: 像我们平常人，我们能够看到丑陋人类的具有摧毁性宿命的结局。
